upload.title: Upload Dataset
upload.description: Upload a CSV or JSON file to start visualizing

dropzone.supports: Supports CSV and TSV files up to {maxSize}MB

samples.title: Sample Datasets
samples.description: Load a bundled dataset without uploading a file
samples.empty: No sample datasets available. Upload your own CSV to get started.

metadata.title: Dataset Metadata
metadata.noData: Upload a dataset to see column stats, sample values, and semantic tags

prompts.topRanking: Rank the top 10 companies by ARR and include their year-over-year growth percentage
prompts.stackedBar: Create a stacked bar chart showing industry share broken down by funding stage
prompts.tableOverview: Show a table with ARR, valuation, and employees sorted by ARR descending
prompts.pieChart: Create a pie chart of industry breakdown
prompts.correlation: Show correlation between founded year and valuation

topPerformers.title: Top performers
topPerformers.description: Rank the top 10 companies by ARR with growth %

trendLine.title: Trend line
trendLine.description: Plot ARR trend over the last 12 months

segmentShare.title: Segment share
segmentShare.description: Stacked bar by industry and funding stage

correlationHeatmap.title: Correlation heatmap
correlationHeatmap.description: ARR vs valuation vs team size

autoInsights.title: Auto insights
autoInsights.description: Let the LLM surface correlations, outliers, and recommended charts

autoInsights.title: Auto insights
autoInsights.empty: Trigger Auto Insights to see correlations, outliers, and recommended visuals inline

feedback.title: Community feedback
feedback.description: Vote once per dataset and see what the community prefers
feedback.signInPrompt: Sign in to share thumbs up/down votes or save this dataset as a favorite

errors.invalidFileType: Please upload a CSV or TSV file
errors.attachFile: Attach a CSV or JSON file
errors.autoInsightsNeedData: Upload a dataset first to run Auto Insights
errors.planLimit: {plan} uploads are limited to {limit}. Upgrade to push bigger files
